title: Microsoft Revenue Up 8% to $56.2 Billion in Latest Quarter
description: The company’s profit topped $20 billion as it pointed to strong interest in its artificial intelligence products.

title: Alphabet Steams Past Lingering Ad Worries, Fueled by Google’s Search Engine
description: Despite concerns of a shaky ad market and growing competition in A.I., Google said it was aided by accelerating revenue from its search engine and the video platform YouTube in the second quarter.

title: Snap’s Sales Fall for the Second Time in a Row
description: The parent of Snapchat has grappled with an ad slump and the challenges of being a smaller social media company in an intensely competitive environment.

title: TikTok Introduces Text-Only Posts
description: The social media app known for its short-form videos will now allow users to create posts that contain only words, competing with Threads and Twitter.

title: Slow Battery Production Crimps G.M.’s Electric Vehicle Rollout
description: The company is earning big profits on gasoline cars and trucks but is struggling to catch up to Tesla in the fastest-growing segment of the auto market.

title: Tech Firms Once Powered New York’s Economy. Now They’re Scaling Back.
description: After years of steady growth, many technology companies are laying off workers and giving up millions of square feet of office space in the city.
